author: faraz3920
content:
BLS for EOA authentication.
--------------------------------=
Currently only ECDSA and multisig are supported  for EOA transaction authentication. Would it be possible to also include BLS as signature scheme for ETH2 transactions ?

This would really help applications where an external blockchain/sidechain contract is generating ETH transaction. BLS would allow such contracts to somewhat safely handle private keys of the EOAs

author: sky.cactus
content: There is no ETH2.  Transactions aren't changing with The Merge.

author: faraz3920
content: I see. But this is still possible right

author: sky.cactus
content: It is possible to add BLS transaction types in a future network upgrade, yes.
